body:
So this morning before I went to school I wanted to hop on avicus and play. It said I had to log in (which I always have it auto logged in) so I put my details In and it wouldn't work. So I reqeuested I password reset so I tried to check my in box and I didn't receive an email. So if you see me on it is not me. Any suggestions on what I should do

Edit: I will be using my brothers account IGotAFishingRod so send me a hi if you see me
